mapper.sql: SKU_ID , SPU_ID, SKU_NAME, SKU_INTRO, `STATUS`, MAIN_IMAGE_01, MAIN_IMAGE_02, MAIN_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_01, SUB_IMAGE_02, SUB_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_04, SUB_IMAGE_05, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into tb_sku (SKU_ID, SPU_ID, SKU_NAME, SKU_INTRO, `STATUS`, MAIN_IMAGE_01, MAIN_IMAGE_02, MAIN_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_01, SUB_IMAGE_02, SUB_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_04, SUB_IMAGE_05, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

SKU_ID,

mapper.update:
update tb_sku
SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SKU_INTRO = #{skuIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_01 = #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_02 = #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_03 = #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_01 = #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_02 = #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_03 = #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_04 = #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_05 = #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SKU_ID = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_sku set SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SKU_NAME = #{skuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU_INTRO = #{skuIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_01 = #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_02 = #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_03 = #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_01 = #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_02 = #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_03 = #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_04 = #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_05 = #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SKU_ID = #{skuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.SPU_ID ,T1.SKU_NAME ,T1.SKU_INTRO ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU T1

SELECT T1.SKU_ID ,T1.SPU_ID ,T1.SKU_NAME ,T1.SKU_INTRO ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU T1 WHERE T1.SKU_ID = #{skuId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.SKU_ID ,T1.SPU_ID ,T1.SKU_NAME ,T1.SKU_INTRO ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SKU T1 WHERE T1.SPU_ID = #{spuId}
